lines.text: Sue wants to go into pictures. Do you think she has a chance?
Excuse me while I get 'Spark Plug' a derby.
I've had my test and the director said I was just naturally funny.
Pop, the whole country is mad over oil.
That's one business I do know.
Pop, you've must hit while the iron's hot.
How much can I make on fifteen thousand dollars?
I expect to double my money.
I hope I'm wrong, but I think that man is a crook.
What do you know about business?
That lion won't jump and today I want a thrill.
That's true, but we all make mistakes.
You go on with your movin' pictures - mother and I are going home.
Daddy, why is that man kissing mamma?
